__e: Arthur didn't recognize me last time when I was 80 years old. - There's no reason why he should this time.
Arthur asked me to check to see if he was riding out this morning and... well...
I'd like to think it was possible, but Arthur can't change 200 years of history, no matter how much he may want to.
I know how you feel about Arthur, and how he feels about you.
Now that Arthur's away, you must take time to enjoy yourself.
For this is not Arthur's quest, it is yours.
